title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Refined
description: Further refine the detailed requirements for the ThreatHuntingPlatform by integrating feedback from relevant stakeholders. Ensure thorough documentation of desired features, functionalities, performance expectations, security considerations, compliance requirements, and potential integration with existing threat hunting solutions. Conduct industry research, analyze best practices, and evaluate competitors' offerings to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the project scope.

title: Design System Architecture for ThreatHuntingPlatform
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points for the ThreatHuntingPlatform. The design should aim to maximize efficiency, scalability, and security. Consider integrating with existing cybersecurity tools and services as appropriate.

title: Develop Machine Learning Models
description: Research, develop, and train machine learning models for threat detection and analysis.

title: Implement Expert System
description: Design and implement the expert system component for rule-based threat analysis and decision-making.

title: Design Data Storage and Management (Revised)
description: Design and implement a scalable, high-performance, and secure data storage and management system for storing and processing threat data, logs, and analysis results. The system should support ingesting data from various sources, efficient querying and retrieval, data archiving, integration with other components of the platform, and ensure compliance with relevant data privacy and security regulations. The system should also provide mechanisms for real-time data streaming, anomaly detection, and data visualization.
dependencies: Define Data Privacy and Security Compliance Requirements

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the ThreatHuntingPlatform, including dashboards, visualizations, and user interactions.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security and Access Controls for ThreatHuntingPlatform
description: Design and implement a robust security framework, access controls, data protection mechanisms, and incident response strategies for the ThreatHuntingPlatform. This includes user authentication, authorization, encryption, audit logging, and intrusion detection systems.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the ThreatHuntingPlatform. The pipeline should include steps for code linting, static analysis, unit testing, integration testing, and security scanning. Additionally, it should support multiple environments (e.g., development, staging, production) and enable easy rollbacks in case of issues.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing Strategy for ThreatHuntingPlatform
description: Create and implement a comprehensive testing strategy that encompasses unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for the ThreatHuntingPlatform. The strategy should clearly define test cases, expected outcomes, and any necessary test data. Additionally, include performance and security testing where applicable.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the ThreatHuntingPlatform, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance manuals.
